attributes.action: Don't stop the Dubs scheme - bring refugee children to the UK as promised
attributes.background: David Cameron promised the UK would take in 3,000 vulnerable children from Syria.  The Government have backtracked today - hoping to 'bury bad news', and only bring in 350.  The UK has a proud tradition of protecting children in peril - don't let us down.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
